title: Project not created because videos were not found. Videos works fine on VLC
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

In both GUI and CLI I can't create a project because videos are not found.
Videos are working and can be open and played normally in both VLC.
I tried to reimport again the videos without success, videos are in mp4 format.

### Operating System

Windows

### DeepLabCut version

python 3.8.12
deeplabcut : 2.2.0.3

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

cpu

### Steps To Reproduce

- I cloned the repository
- In anaconda prompt in administrator
- Moved to the conda-environnements folder
- conda env create -f DEEPLABCUT.yaml
- conda activate DEEPLABCUT
- Start gui via python -m deeplabcut
- Create new project, name the project, choose one or multiple videos, Press OK. Get the error

### Relevant log output

```shell
D:\DLC\fsafas2-mazr-2021-12-13\videos\17226.mp4

C:\Users\Marie\anaconda\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\create_project\new.py:188: UserWarning: Cannot open the video file! Skipping to the next one...

  warnings.warn("Cannot open the video file! Skipping to the next one...")

C:\Users\Marie\anaconda\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\create_project\new.py:194: UserWarning: No valid videos were found. The project was not created... Verify the video files and re-create the project.

  warnings.warn(

Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "C:\Users\Marie\anaconda\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\gui\create_new_project.py", line 390, in create_new_project

    cfg = auxiliaryfunctions.read_config(self.cfg)

  File "C:\Users\Marie\anaconda\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\auxiliaryfunctions.py", line 188, in read_config

    raise FileNotFoundError(

FileNotFoundError: Config file is not found. Please make sure that the file exists and/or that you passed the path of the config file correctly!
```
```


### Anything else?

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [X] I agree to follow this project's [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
